content: a simple colourblock top that provides a canvas for displaying two of your favorite colours duet is knit from the top down with a relaxed fit and minimal finishing the main star of this top is your own duet of colours duet was originally inspired by yarn purchased from katrina of pirate purl yarns the idea was to keep the design minimal to show off the two beautiful neutral shades i then knit a second version with our journey base using two of my favorite shades mauve and rose a duet of colour yarns and dyers have all combined to create this design **finished measurements** 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 68 91 5 101 5 112 122 132 142 152 5 162 5 173 cm circumference at bust sample size is 40 101 5cm shown on a bust size of 34 86cm **yarn** skein journey 100% superfine alpaca 400 yards 366 meters in 100g cc1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 cc2 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 sample colourways cc1 dusk pale mauve and cc2 retro rose dark rose or pirate purl blackbeard 90% polwarth 10% silk 371 yards 340 meters in 100g cc1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 cc2 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 sample colourways cc1 hard candy collection shade #18 pale neutral and cc2 coal dark grey or skein daintree 65% superwash merino 20% natural bamboo 15% silk 437 yards 400 meters in 100g cc1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 cc2 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 sample colourways cc1 pink tourmaline pale pink and cc2 pure gold deep gold **needles ** 4mm us 6 3 5mm us 4 for rib **other** stitch holders stitch markers removable markers and tapestry needle **gauge** 22 5 sts and 32 row to 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch on larger needles ………………………………………………………… we have a skein group 1 please join us for kal s pattern discussion and test knits sign up to our newsletter 2 to keep up to date with pattern releases all subscribers receive 20% off all new release designs on the day of release please share your wips and fos in our group or on instagram #duettop #skeinyarn 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/skein 2 https //skeinyarn com/
